alert.note: Alert for Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 12:38PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern White Pine, southwestern Elko and east central Eureka Counties through 115 PM PDT... At 1237 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles west of Ruby Lake, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Brief heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern White Pine, southwestern Elko and east central Eureka Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; Southwest Elko County
